title: Bug 116609[Regression]Color orange doesn't work.
description: Bug 116609[Regression]Color orange doesn't work. Description:Color orange doesn't work.Steps to reproduce:1.
OB: When setting the color or background color to orange on a report item, it does not change to the expected color.
EB: The report item should change to the color orange when the color or background color is set to orange.
SR: 1. Insert a report item. 2. Set the color or background color to orange. 3. Verify that the report item changes to the color orange.
